name: Suspicious Service Installation Script
query: (winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:/[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\ [Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll]\ [Mm][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Ee][Rr]/ AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:/.*\ \/[Cc]\ .*/ AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:(/.*[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*[Ww][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Aa].*/ OR /.*[Rr][Uu][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ll]32.*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*\ \/C\ * AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:(*powershell* OR *wscript* OR *cscript* OR *mshta* OR *rundll32*))`
